title: Looking for a casual club - 'new' old player
body:
Hey guys, I stopped playing league about one and a half years ago (I played since season 1-2 before that) and I just recently started again. Gave my account to a friend a while back so I decided to just start fresh again and I'm in the middle of leveling up.

Just looking for a club with discord that I can enjoy my time in. I'm up for anything once I reach level 30. So if there's any chill clubs out there, let me know.

replies.body: Hey mate I am looking to expand the league community in my discord, more than happy for you to join at https://discord.gg/VPzyWYp
